attributes.action: stop M5 traffic diverting through residential villages for planned maintenance work
attributes.additional_details: The residents of South Worcestershire are entitled to protection from excessive noise pollution created by M5 planned motorway closures diverting through villages such as Kempsey, Clifton, Severn Stoke, Ripple etc.  We are calling for action against uneccessary total motorway closures and asking that non emergency routine maintenance be carried out keeping one lane of the motorway open to reduce the negative impacts on thousands of homes and famillies. 4 weeks of no sleep is causing our health and welfare to be compromised.
